note:
Northern English, born and remained. Prefers 'British'.
2 adult offspring

Incapacitated. Uncoordinated, cluster headaches and migraines. Memory and concentration difficulties.

Was a transport manager 20 years ago. A useless but still helpful lump since.

Gamer: Vic-20 to BBC B to Amiga 500 & 1200 to PC.

Film fan, especially noir.
Interested in U.S. politics (for distance lends enchantment to the view)

Hashtags: under careful consideration.

name: Image description of profile picture
value: a black and white clean head and shoulders line drawing of one of the Woodmen, or Woses, from Tolkein's world by Liz Danforth, from the second edition Middle Earth roleplaying game rulebook

name: Image description of banner picture
value: A rainbow gradient on which the image credit for the profile picture and itself are written. The gradient is by GuildMasterInfinite (all one word) at DeviantArt. Text above the banner credit reads 'This banner is just - and not just - a rainbow gradient'.
